text: Holiday: Pillow Fight Day! Everyone brings pillows to parks and battles it out.
A workspace with big windows, tons of plants, and a built-in coffee machine.
A backpack that dispenses hot pizza slices — yes, I’d buy it.
National Do-Nothing Day — where the only goal is to just rest.
The boredom monster is gray and slow. I defeat it by learning something new.
A coffee mug that charges your phone — best of both worlds.
Ice Cream for Breakfast Day — enough said.
Desk by a lake, surrounded by silence and fast Wi-Fi.
It looks like static on an old TV and vanishes when I go outside.
Shoes that change color based on your mood.
A bright room, big whiteboard, and a keyboard that clicks perfectly.
It’s like a foggy blob. I destroy it with loud music and dancing.
